item.title: Completely free and easy way to set up a blog
item.author: Author
item.description: Introduction I always had a challenge with; when I find a solution for a certain problem and months down the line I run into a very similar problem and try to remember how I solved the previous one. So as many professionals in the IT business I created a blog to write those solutions down for myself and anyone who stumbles upon the blog. Unfortunately my blog at that time has followed the trend of the general population of IT related blogs and withered away due to the lack of attention from yours truly.
